DOC.brief_summary: The aim randomize control trial ass impact progressive resistance exercise ( PRE ) PD patient akinesia rigidity ( AR-subtype ) . The investigator hypothesize intervention would beneficial effect study outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Strength Training Different Subtypes Parkinson´s Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty-eight patient PD AR-type sex , recruit trial . Each participant assign randomly either intervention ( N=13 ) control ( N=15 ) group . The intervention group participate sixteen PRE training session eight week : two session per week non-consecutive day , sixty-seventy min one . The control group follow usual weekly physical activity routine . All patient underwent antrophometrical neuromuscular function assessment ( CoP measurement -primary outcomes- Ten-Meters Walk Test -TMWT- -secondary outcomes- ) . In addition , ask provide rating Spanish validate version Freezing Gait Questionnaire ( FOG-Q , 6-item version ) -secondary outcomes- , 39-item Parkinson ́s disease Questionnaire ( PDQ39 ) -secondary outcomes- MDS-UPDRS -secondary outcomes- . Additionally , rating perceive exertion ( RPE ) ( Borg > 6-20 scale ) - secondary outcomes- , record end PRE training session . Tests carry three time : pre-test ( train program ) , post-test ( eight week pre-tests , end train period ) , four week post-test ( re-test ) .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed PD ARtype Hoehn Yahr Scale 12 , ( H & Y ) Do express type dementia Able stand two min without assistance ; Able walk ten metres without assistance . Exclusion criterion : To suffer neurological disease PD . Do meet inclusion criterion .
